slots_collected.job_description: Kitchen sink leaking under the cabinet

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Good morning, thanks for calling Reliable Home Services. My name is Alex. How can I help you today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Hi, I need to book a plumber. My kitchen sink is leaking.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: I can definitely help you with that. Let me connect you with our booking specialist.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Hi there, I'll help you get that plumbing appointment set up. Could I start with your full name please?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Got it, John. And what's the best phone number to reach you on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Thanks. And I've noted you need plumbing service. What date works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Tuesday the eighteenth would be great.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Tuesday the eighteenth. And what time suits you best?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Around 10 in the morning if possible.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: 10 AM. And what's the address for the service?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Great. Can you briefly describe the issue?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Yeah, the kitchen sink has been leaking under the cabinet. There's a small puddle forming.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Here's what I have: name: John Smith, phone number: 0412345678, type of service: plumbing, preferred date: 2025-03-18, preferred time: 10:00, service address: 42 Oak Avenue, Richmond VIC 3121. Does everything sound correct?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Booking confirmed. Reference number: BK-A1B2C3. Plumbing service on 2025-03-18 at 10:00. Is there anything else I can help with?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: You're welcome, John. We'll see you on Tuesday. Have a great day!
